branchCategory.name: ISE30A/ZSE30A Panel Mount Adapter, Front Protection Cover
branchCategory.description: <p>Based on our successful ZSE/ISE 30 Series, our new high precision digital pressure switch, Series ZSE30 A(F) / ISE30A, with dual color display, offers even more high performance features. Now available with either NPN or PNP dual open collector outputs, or with the addition of an additional analog output (voltage or current), the sensors improved copy function also allows you to simultaneously set up to 10 switch&nbsp;monitors while setting the base.&nbsp; With a simple to follow three step setting process and the addition of a password setting function, potential errors, lengthy setting time and unwanted manipulation are kept to an absolute minimum. Further features of the CE, UL/CSA and RoHS compliant ZSE30 A(F) / ISE30A include a&nbsp; power saving function, which reduces energy consumption by up to 20%,&nbsp; various piping options and direct or panel mounting capabilities.</p>

breadCrumb.name: ISE30A/ZSE30A Panel Mount Adapter, Front Protection Cover
